description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: OS command injection vulnerability in ROS2 Galactic Geochelone in ROS_VERSION 2 and ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code, escalate privileges, and obtain sensitive information via the command processing or system call components in ROS2, including External Command Execution Modules, System Call Handlers, and Interface Scripts.
